title: Velvet Revolver LIVE in Houston
description:
Velvet Revolver LIVE in Houston (2004) to promote their newly released first CD. This LIVE concert was originally recorded in HD and re-encoded for your viewing pleasure! This hour and 18 minute (approx) concert features songs from both, GnR and STP while including tracks from the new album. With the recent departure of Scott Weiland to reform STP in anticipation of opening for a possible Led Zepplin reunion tour, Slash and the boys are back to auditioning new lead singers to head-up Velvet Revolver making this an instant classic.

This video also includes short interviews with the band members on such things as the forming of the band, Scotts drug addiction, and other gems.


Format: xvid, mp3
Resolution: 624x352 WS HD
Time: 1:18:00 (approx. runtime)
Year: 2004
Frame Rate: 29fps
